title: Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: 5-harness satin damask; alternating rows of S-twist and Z-twist stems on the plants
dimensions:
a) Warp x Weft: 24 x 13 cm (9 7/16 x 5 1/8 in.)
b) Warp x Weft: 14 x 22 cm (5 1/2 x 8 11/16 in.)
c) Warp x Weft: 13 x 19.5 cm (5 1/8 x 7 11/16 in.)
d) Warp x Weft: 19.5 x 10.5 cm (7 11/16 x 4 1/8 in.)
description: Yellow-green damask with staggered rows of two types of flowering plants.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century.
late 16th–early 17th century. Medium: silk
Technique: 5-harness satin damask; alternating rows of S-twist and Z-twist stems on the plants. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1968-135-15-a/d.
